titles.title: Water Resources Research Amendments Act
Water Resources Research Amendments Act

A bill to amend the Water Resources Research Act of 1984 to reauthorize grants for and require applied water supply research regarding the water resources research and technology institutes established under that Act.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
Water Resources Research Amendments Act
This bill reauthorizes through FY2023 the water resources research program and otherwise revises the program, including by increasing the federal share of grant funding under the program for water resources research and technology institutes.
